creditline: Gift of Mary and Bob Mersky
description: crowded, colorful scene with many disproportionate figures with very large heads in background; two cowboys at center--one at left wears black hat, shirt and chaps with blue jeans and is being thrown from a reddish-brown steer, with second cowboy in red shirt, orange chaps and blue jeans, riding steer at center; received framed in white frame; two sheets
signed: bottom right of center on right sheet in grey: Mimi Gross (symbol) 1976
title: Rodeo Scene
